name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening wait screen for ReGLOSS 1st Live 'Flashpoint' featuring characters Hiodoshi Ao, Otonose Kanade, Ichijou Ririka, Juufuutei Raden, and Todoroki Hajime with event information and rules.
Attention screen with important safety warnings about flashing lights and venue rules regarding cheering.
Virtual message board display featuring a montage of fan messages, illustrations, and supportive comments for the ReGLOSS members ahead of their first live concert at Ariake Arena.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: スクリーンショット・SNSへの投稿もOK！
subtitles.english:
Feel free to share screenshots and reactions
on social media!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグ #ReGLOSS1stLive で盛り上がりましょう！
subtitles.english:
Use the hashtag #ReGLOSS1stLive
and join the conversation!

subtitles.original:
録音、録画、ミラー配信や
違法アップロードは固くお断りいたします
subtitles.english:
Audio, video recordings, mirror streams,
and illegal uploads are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: ATTENTION ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english:
Please be aware of flashing lights
during the performance.

subtitles.original: 声出し応援 OK です
